text:
The link to the neutron introspection file in page2xhtml.xsl is missing a slash
when using uuids.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com

text:
Created attachment 18853
fixes introspection.xml link

This patch removes (if present) the leading slash of the $document-id, so that
the old document-id and new document-uuid both work correctly in creating the
introspection.xml link.
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
andreas@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the patch!
I committed a slightly different version (use document-path instead of
document-id), this way we don't have to support obsolete (non-uuid) documents
explicitely.
